identified-content.classifier: Top/News/Sports/Pro Football/National Football League/New York Jets

abstract.p: New York Jets announce signing of defensive tackle Richard Seals, seventh-round pick in draft last month (S)

block.p: The Jets announced yesterday that they had signed defensive tackle Richard Seals, a seventh-round pick in the draft last month.
Seals, 24, from the University of Utah, had 36 tackles and 9 sacks in his senior season. He finished his college career with 78 tackles, 17 of them for losses, and 13.5 sacks.
The Jets announced yesterday that they had signed defensive tackle Richard Seals, a seventh-round pick in the draft last month.
Seals, 24, from the University of Utah, had 36 tackles and 9 sacks in his senior season. He finished his college career with 78 tackles, 17 of them for losses, and 13.5 sacks.
The 6-foot-3-inch, 316-pound Seals is the third of New York's eight picks to sign, after Laveranues Coles, the third-round choice, and Tony Scott, the sixth-round pick.
The Jets also released safety Pedro Cirino, a rookie free agent from Boston College.
